definition: "Used to express equivalence or similarity between two things or situations, often used in comparisons or to emphasize that something is exactly the same or in the same way."

examples.german: Sie ist genauso groß wie ich.
examples.english: She is as tall as me.

examples.german: Er hat genauso viel Geld wie ich.
examples.english: He has as much money as me.

examples.german: Das schmeckt genauso gut wie gestern.
examples.english: It tastes just as good as yesterday.

examples.german: Ich bin genauso müde wie du.
examples.english: I am just as tired as you.
